Dear Hagop and Joe

 

Really appreciated for your kind feedback.

 

To avoid misunderstanding, could I ask for two more doubts as below:

 

1.  Group stock insurance will cover GCH & SEA all stores location for sure, how about our products kept in warehouse of third part? It is also included? In each region we have one warehouse to keep all stocks. If need I will update warehouse location to you ASAP 

 

Covered. Just mention the warehouse location and the value of the stock within the premises.

Just mention the warehouse location and the value of the stock within the premises.

 

 

2. Sometimes we need do some special sales or display our products out of normal store location shortly, averagely less than one month, this kinds of stock insurance also can be covered by HQ policy? If not, we would buy them case by case locally.

 

Covered up to 21 days for off-premises activities (exhibitions, trade fairs, events, etc…).

 

3. for CGL, per Joe notice, Singapore is not included in group CGL policy, not sure the reason. if SG still can’t be added in group, we will purchase this part for 2024 locally. Thanks.

 

@Joe Nasr <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> , if we provide you the updated turnover details for Christofle, would you be able to provide a quotation to cover all Christofle entities under the master cover?

 

Have a lovely day and weekend ❤

Tina

Subject: RE: [External] - Y 2024 ) 1) Employer’s liability + 2) CGL + 3) PDBI STANDALONE 

 

Dear Tina,

 

Please find my comments below:

 

1.	Clema told me Christofle or Chalhoub group will buy all stock insurance which will cover GUFAN + KG products located in each store + office + each warehouse, right? But the broker never saw the insurance policy, I just want to confirm it.

 

Confirmed

 

2.	If the above confirmation is yes, how about SG stock insurance, I noticed in previous years, SG also paid this part insurance separately, I need to cancel it or keep all same items for SG as previous years?

 

There is no need to purchase stock insurance. Stocks are covered from the UAE 

 

3.	Even HQ help to cover all stock insurance, some landlord also need us to provide the insurance policy, so far we not provide them yet.

 

Please advise whenever you need a certificate for stock insurance and I will arrange for you.

 

4.	For PD(Property All risks insurance), many landlord ask us to add them together as additional insured, in previous years Clema helped to buy the local additional insurance to meet the request, should we keep the same way in Y2024, or have other solution?

 

Best to have automatic inclusion of landlord when required by contract as an additional clause to cover this requirement automatically. The landlord name can be specifically mentioned when providing insurance certificates validating the cover.

 

5.	For CGL (Commercial General Liability), also many landlord to require much higher insured limit, sometimes Clema also have to buy additional insurance again, I know from the HQ view, it is not easy to increase it for all from the cost control view, maybe we have to keep the same way, pls suggest.

@Joe Nasr <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> , can you confirm that AIG Difference in limit policy covers our locations in China and Singapore? Thank you

 

6.	KG not did any BI insurance in previous years, while GUFAN has it, even with the same broker, they not know the reason, pls kindly give us your suggestions.

 

Our standard practice is to include BI for 6 months based on the Gross Profit figure.

 

Remain at your disposal for any further clarification required.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Tina,

 

Please find my comments below:

 

1.	Clema told me Christofle or Chalhoub group will buy all stock insurance which will cover GUFAN + KG products located in each store + office + each warehouse, right? But the broker never saw the insurance policy, I just want to confirm it.

 

Confirmed

 

2.	If the above confirmation is yes, how about SG stock insurance, I noticed in previous years, SG also paid this part insurance separately, I need to cancel it or keep all same items for SG as previous years?

 

There is no need to purchase stock insurance. Stocks are covered from the UAE 

 

3.	Even HQ help to cover all stock insurance, some landlord also need us to provide the insurance policy, so far we not provide them yet.

 

Please advise whenever you need a certificate for stock insurance and I will arrange for you.

 

4.	For PD(Property All risks insurance), many landlord ask us to add them together as additional insured, in previous years Clema helped to buy the local additional insurance to meet the request, should we keep the same way in Y2024, or have other solution?

 

Best to have automatic inclusion of landlord when required by contract as an additional clause to cover this requirement automatically. The landlord name can be specifically mentioned when providing insurance certificates validating the cover.

 

5.	For CGL (Commercial General Liability), also many landlord to require much higher insured limit, sometimes Clema also have to buy additional insurance again, I know from the HQ view, it is not easy to increase it for all from the cost control view, maybe we have to keep the same way, pls suggest.

Dear Hagop and Joe

 

Really appreciated for your kind feedback.

 

To avoid misunderstanding, could I ask for two more doubts as below:

 

1.  Group stock insurance will cover GCH & SEA all stores location for sure, how about our products kept in warehouse of third part? It is also included? In each region we have one warehouse to keep all stocks. If need I will update warehouse location to you ASAP 

 

Covered. Just mention the warehouse location and the value of the stock within the premises.

 

 

2. Sometimes we need do some special sales or display our products out of normal store location shortly, averagely less than one month, this kinds of stock insurance also can be covered by HQ policy? If not, we would buy them case by case locally.

 

Covered up to 21 days for off-premises activities (exhibitions, trade fairs, events, etc…).

 

3. for CGL, per Joe notice, Singapore is not included in group CGL policy, not sure the reason. if SG still can’t be added in group, we will purchase this part for 2024 locally. Thanks.

 

@Joe Nasr <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> , if we provide you the updated turnover details for Christofle, would you be able to provide a quotation to cover all Christofle entities under the master cover?
